newsitem.title: USA: Cymer Inc sets terms for IPO.
newsitem.headline: Cymer Inc sets terms for IPO.

text.p: Cymer Inc said it plans to offer 3.34 million shares in an estimated price range of $7.50-$9.50 each in its upcoming initial public offering.
The company filed in July for an IPO but did not disclose terms of the deal.
Cymer's excimer lasers are used in the deep ultraviolet photolithography systems used to make the very small images that are used make advanced semiconductor chips.
Morgan Stanley & Co Inc, Montgomery Securities and Needham & Co Inc are the underwriters of the offering.
The company has filed to list on the Nasdaq under the symbol "CYMI".
